channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:19 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 10:19 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 10:06 Alarm response in Chernihiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:06 Alarm response in Chernihiv region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Чернигивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291#Купянский_район This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 09:31 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Myrivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 09:31 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m.
